statements: SELECT * FROM location_histories;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM location_histories WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_histories WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM location_histories ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM location_histories WHERE visit_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM location_histories WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_histories WHERE visit_timestamp > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY visit_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM location_histories WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_visits FROM location_histories GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_visits > 5;
SELECT user_id, MAX(visit_timestamp) AS latest_visit FROM location_histories GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY latest_visit DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT starting_location, ending_location, travel_date FROM travel_routes WHERE travel_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM user_locations WHERE latitude >= 40 AND longitude <= -100;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM travel_routes WHERE travel_date = '2022-09-10' ORDER BY route_id DESC;
SELECT starting_location, ending_location FROM travel_routes WHERE user_id = 3 AND travel_date < '2022-09-20';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_locations FROM user_locations GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_locations > 2;
SELECT MIN(latitude), MAX(longitude) FROM user_locations;
SELECT * FROM user_locations;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, start_location, end_location, route_distance FROM user_routes ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations JOIN user_routes ON user_locations.user_id = user_routes.user_id;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude, visit_timestamp FROM user_locations WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_routes WHERE route_distance > 10 ORDER BY route_distance DESC;
SELECT user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, location_name FROM user_locations WHERE latitude < -15 OR longitude > 30 ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT activity_id, user_id, activity_name, activity_date FROM user_activities WHERE user_id = 3 AND activity_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT location_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT user_id, location_id, visited_at FROM user_locations ORDER BY visited_at DESC;
SELECT route_id, user_id, start_location_id, end_location_id, route_date FROM routes WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM locations ORDER BY location_id DESC;

SELECT u.username, l.location_name, r.route_date FROM users u JOIN user_locations ul ON u.user_id = ul.user_id JOIN locations l ON ul.location_id = l.location_id JOIN routes r ON u.user_id = r.user_id WHERE r.route_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY r.route_date ASC;

SELECT u.username, l1.location_name AS start_location, l2.location_name AS end_location FROM users u JOIN routes r ON u.user_id = r.user_id JOIN locations l1 ON r.start_location_id = l1.location_id JOIN locations l2 ON r.end_location_id = l2.location_id WHERE r.route_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM UserLocations LIMIT 10;
SELECT location_name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT DISTINCT location_name FROM UserLocations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT user_id, location_name, timestamp FROM UserLocations WHERE latitude > 30 AND longitude < -90 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, route_duration FROM UserTravelRoutes WHERE route_duration > '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM UserLocations WHERE location_name = 'New York';
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, route_duration FROM UserTravelRoutes WHERE route_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT destination_id, location_name, total_visits FROM PopularDestinations ORDER BY total_visits DESC;
SELECT user_id, location_name, latitude, longitude FROM UserLocations WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT location_name, category_name FROM LocationCategories JOIN UserPreferences ON LocationCategories.category_id = UserPreferences.category_id WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
